sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in GTT Communications, Inc (Symbol: GTT), where a total of 1,660 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 166,000 underlying shares.
That amounts to about 50.9% of GTT's average daily trading volume over the past month of 326,440 shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $60 strike call option expiring December 20, 2019, with 365 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 36,500 underlying shares of GTT.

Below is a chart showing GTT's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $60 strike highlighted in orange:

Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) saw options trading volume of 19,192 contracts, representing approximately 1.9 million underlying shares or approximately 50.3% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 3.8 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $167.50 strike call option expiring June 07, 2019, with 2,527 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 252,700 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $167.50 strike highlighted in orange:

And Electronic Arts, Inc. (Symbol: EA) options are showing a volume of 19,052 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 1.9 million underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 50% of EA's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 3.8 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $95 strike call option expiring June 21, 2019, with 1,386 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 138,600 underlying shares of EA.

Below is a chart showing EA's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $95 strike highlighted in orange:
